about_the_game:
Black Light Kills Demo offers a unique experience designed to give you a brief introduction to the dark atmosphere you will encounter in the full version of the game. In this demo version, you will progress through mysterious areas with the character Aiden, experiencing chilling encounters.

Demo Content

  • Dark Basement: Aiden will wander through the dark basement of the asylum, encountering mysterious sounds and frightening visuals.

  • Patients' Memories: In the basement of the asylum, Aiden will find notes related to the horrifying events that have befallen the patients. These notes will provide clues about the patients' escape attempts, their traumas, and the traces of those who have gone missing.

  • Limited Areas to Explore: Aiden will gain access to specific rooms in the house that has become shrouded in mystery following the disappearance of his best friend, Reznik, while needing to find two keys.

  • Story Clues: Discover the background of the mystery by uncovering notes left by Reznik and tracing the remnants of the past.

  • Tense Atmosphere: Prepare to feel fear with immersive sound effects and visuals that you will encounter in the full game.

Please note: This demo offers only limited content and does not include all the gameplay mechanics and areas from the full version. There are only 2 sections available in the demo.

name: Black Light Kills Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD AMD Phenom II X6 1055T
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7850 (2GB VRAM)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050TI (4 GB) / Radeon RX 570 (4 GB)

short_description: Welcome to the darkness of the town, where you walk the fine line between reality and dreams, questioning your sanity. Black Light Kills takes you deep into the mind of Aiden, where reality fades, and nightmares begin
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Czech, Swedish, Bosnian, Georgian, Hindi, Icelandic
*languages with full audio support
